item.title: Making in the Apocalypse: How I shipped a SaaS after Hurricane Maria
item.description: This is naturally a difficult story to tell. It involves two very hard things for me, the passing of Hurricane María and the shutdown of a previous startup. But I’m wishing to tell my story, so others can learn and be inspired by it. The calm I decided to include what I felt, for context. September 16, 2017. Caguas, Puerto Rico. You would’ve thought it was a normal day, until you looked at the TV monitors and noticed the panic that was going on.
